name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full width video in Google Cloud Skills Boost

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make videos in Google Cloud Skills Boost occupy the full page width without having to use fullscreen mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make videos in Google Cloud Skills Boost occupy the full page width without having to use fullscreen mode. This is useful specially if you watch them in a big screen and want to keep the course menu and side subtitles bar visible.
